title: Protest launched to mark 50 days of GotaGoGama
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Inter-University Students Federation, Trade Unions, Youth Movements and other organizations launched a protest march from the Liberty Roundabout in Colpetty to the GotaGoGama protest site in front of the President’s Office today (28).
The protest march was launched to mark 50 days since the people’s protests at GotaGoGama being launched.
Meanwhile, barricades have been placed near the World Trade Center while Police presence in the area has been increased as well.
